stimulusHtml:
Directions: Show all your work. Indicate clearly the methods you use, because you will be graded on the correctness of your methods as well as on the accuracy of your results and explanation.

The graph below displays the scores of 32 students on a recent exam. Scores on this exam ranged from 64 to 95 points.

  1. Describe the shape of this distribution.

  2. In order to motivate her students, the instructor of the class wants to report that, overall, the classâ€™s performance on the exam was high. Which summary statistic, the mean or the median, should the instructor use to report that overall exam performance was high? Explain.

  3. The midrange is defined as (maximum + minimum) / 2. Compute this value using the data on the preceding page.

    Is the midrange considered a measure of center or a measure of spread? Explain.
